mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supplies_detail ( product_name, model_name, unit_price, unit_text, quantity, section_id, applicator_id, nesssary_reason, applicate_date, confirmer_id, order_key, supplier, scheduled_date, recept_date, budget_month, inline_recept_date, comments, invoice_no ) VALUES ( #{product_name}, #{model_name}, #{unit_price}, #{unit_text}, #{quantity}, #{section_id}, #{applicator_id}, #{nesssary_reason}, #{applicate_date}, #{confirmer_id}, #{order_key}, #{supplier}, #{scheduled_date}, #{recept_date}, #{budget_month}, #{inline_recept_date}, #{comments}, #{invoice_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT sd.supplies_key, sd.product_name, sd.model_name, sd.unit_price, sd.unit_text, sd.quantity, sd.section_id, section.name AS section_name, sd.applicator_id, applicator_op.name AS applicator_name, sd.nesssary_reason, sd.applicate_date, sd.confirmer_id, confirmer_op.name AS confirmer_name, sd.order_key, so.order_no, sd.supplier, sd.scheduled_date, sd.recept_date, sd.budget_month, sd.inline_recept_date, sd.comments, sd.invoice_no FROM supplies_detail sd JOIN section ON sd.section_id = section.section_id JOIN operator applicator_op ON applicator_op.operator_id = sd.applicator_id LEFT JOIN operator confirmer_op ON confirmer_op.operator_id = sd.confirmer_id LEFT JOIN supplies_order so ON so.order_key = sd.order_key WHERE sd.supplies_key = #{supplies_key}

SELECT sd.supplies_key, sd.product_name, sd.model_name, sd.unit_price, sd.unit_text, sd.quantity, sd.section_id, section.name AS section_name, sd.applicator_id, applicator_op.name AS applicator_name, sd.nesssary_reason, sd.applicate_date, sd.confirmer_id, confirmer_op.name AS confirmer_name, sd.order_key, sd.supplier, sd.scheduled_date, sd.recept_date, sd.budget_month, sd.inline_recept_date, sd.comments, sd.invoice_no FROM supplies_detail sd JOIN section ON sd.section_id = section.section_id JOIN operator applicator_op ON applicator_op.operator_id = sd.applicator_id JOIN operator confirmer_op ON confirmer_op.operator_id = sd.confirmer_id WHERE sd.order_key IS NULL AND sd.confirmer_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sd.applicate_date
mapper.update: UPDATE supplies_detail SET product_name = #{product_name}, model_name = #{model_name}, unit_price = #{unit_price}, unit_text = #{unit_text}, quantity = #{quantity}, supplier = #{supplier}, nesssary_reason = #{nesssary_reason}, comments = #{comments}, scheduled_date = #{scheduled_date}, budget_month = #{budget_month} WHERE supplies_key = #{supplies_key}
mapper.select: SELECT sd.supplies_key, sd.product_name, sd.model_name, sd.unit_price, sd.unit_text, sd.quantity, sd.section_id, section.name AS section_name, sd.applicator_id, applicator_op.name AS applicator_name, sd.nesssary_reason, sd.applicate_date, sd.confirmer_id, confirmer_op.name AS confirmer_name, sd.order_key, so.order_no, sd.supplier, sd.scheduled_date, sd.recept_date, sd.budget_month, sd.inline_recept_date, sd.comments, sd.invoice_no FROM supplies_detail sd JOIN section ON sd.section_id = section.section_id JOIN operator applicator_op ON applicator_op.operator_id = sd.applicator_id JOIN operator confirmer_op ON confirmer_op.operator_id = sd.confirmer_id JOIN supplies_order so ON so.order_key = sd.order_key WHERE sd.order_key IS NOT NULL AND (sd.order_key <> '0' OR sd.order_key <> '00000000000') AND sd.recept_date IS NULL AND so.sign_manager_id IS NOT NULL AND so.sign_minister_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sd.order_key

SELECT sd.supplies_key, sd.product_name, sd.model_name, sd.unit_price, sd.unit_text, sd.quantity, sd.section_id, section.name AS section_name, section.full_name AS section_full_name, sd.applicator_id, applicator_op.name AS applicator_name, sd.nesssary_reason, sd.applicate_date, sd.confirmer_id, confirmer_op.name AS confirmer_name, sd.order_key, sd.supplier, sd.scheduled_date, sd.recept_date, sd.budget_month, sd.inline_recept_date, sd.comments, sd.invoice_no FROM supplies_detail sd JOIN section ON sd.section_id = section.section_id JOIN operator applicator_op ON applicator_op.operator_id = sd.applicator_id LEFT JOIN operator confirmer_op ON confirmer_op.operator_id = sd.confirmer_id WHERE sd.order_key = #{order_key}
